Articles.Content:
Hello KSP Forums, 

I am working on a mod, and I need some advice. 

Could it be possible to, when the player completes a certain task, either edit an existing planet, (so that the next task will be there) or to add a completely new one (as reward for doing the tasks)?

Please keep in mind that I only want to do these changes to the save where the player has done these tasks.

Sincerely, 

OndrikB
